title: Zion National Park: Hiking
body: Hiking in Zion          Â       Hiking Hiking in Zion, even short hikes, requires advance planning. Your safety is your responsibility.   Group Size Limits The group size limit for all wilderness trails, including The Narrows beyond Orderville Canyon, is 12 people.  Print out your Zion National Park Hiking Guide.  For wilderness trail information, visit Wilderness Trail Descriptions. For updated trail closure information, check the Current Conditions.
